title: Sweet Coffee Cake
preview: A dessert with a really soft and fragrant dough filled with cream and perfect for any occasion.

title: Coffee Icing
preview: The Coffee Glaze is a basic preparation with a glossy appearance that is easy and quick to prepare.

title: Coffee panna cotta
preview: Spoon dessert perfect for any occasion

title: Very light coffee cream
preview: The perfect dessert to serve at the end of a meal

title: Almond coffee
preview: Flat white almondmilk and Espresso Roast with a hint of honey, a perfect amount of creamy, nutty sweetness.

title: Cappuccino
preview: Dark, rich espresso lies in wait under a smoothed and stretched layer of thick milk foam.

title: Milkshake
preview: A little whipped cream and a sprinkle of chocolate flakes are perfect for this rich chocolaty drink

title: Brasiliano
preview: Espresso meets a dollop of whipped cream to enhance the rich and caramelly flavors of a straight-up shot.
